import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'new-instance', templateUrl: './new-instance.component.html', styleUrls: ['./new-instance.component.scss'] }) export class NewInstanceComponent { @Input() buttonInfo : string; screenVisible : boolean = false; toggleScreen(){ this.screenVisible = !this.screenVisible; } }
